name: Learnify
shortDescription: Learnify is a mobile app that helps kids with dyslexia in converting PDF/Image(Text) to Audio, font of PDFs to open dyslexic, and voice to text notes.
longDescription: Learnify is a mobile app that helps kids with dyslexia in converting PDF/Image(Text) to Audio, font of PDFs to open dyslexic and voice to text notes.
